King's Shield.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
King's Shield.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.

Knock Off.name: Knock Off
Knock Off.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
Knock Off.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

Kowtow Cleave.name: Kowtow Cleave
Kowtow Cleave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
Kowtow Cleave.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

Land's Wrath.name: Land's Wrath
Land's Wrath.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Laser Focus.name: Laser Focus
Laser Focus.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the user's attacks will be critical hits.
Laser Focus.shortDesc: Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.

Lash Out.name: Lash Out
Lash Out.desc: Power doubles if the user had a stat stage lowered this turn.
Lash Out.shortDesc: 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.

Last Resort.name: Last Resort
Last Resort.desc: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
Last Resort.shortDesc: Fails unless each known move has been used.

Last Respects.name: Last Respects
Last Respects.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times any Pokemon has fainted on the user's side, and X cannot be greater than 100.
Last Respects.shortDesc: +50 power for each time a party member fainted.

Lava Plume.name: Lava Plume
Lava Plume.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Leaf Blade.name: Leaf Blade
Leaf Blade.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Leaf Storm.name: Leaf Storm
Leaf Storm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Leaf Storm.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Leaf Tornado.name: Leaf Tornado
Leaf Tornado.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Leaf Tornado.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

Leech Life.name: Leech Life
Leech Life.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Leech Life.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Leech Seed.name: Leech Seed
Leech Seed.desc: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Mortal Spin or Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.
Leech Seed.shortDesc: 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.

Leer.name: Leer
Leer.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Lick.name: Lick
Lick.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Life Dew.name: Life Dew
Life Dew.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
Life Dew.shortDesc: Heals the user and its allies by 1/4 their max HP.

Light of Ruin.name: Light of Ruin
Light of Ruin.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Light Screen.name: Light Screen
Light Screen.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
Light Screen.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

Light That Burns the Sky.name: Light That Burns the Sky
Light That Burns the Sky.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Light That Burns the Sky.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.

Liquidation.name: Liquidation
Liquidation.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Liquidation.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Lock-On.name: Lock-On
Lock-On.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
Lock-On.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

Lovely Kiss.name: Lovely Kiss
Lovely Kiss.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
Lovely Kiss.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Low Kick.name: Low Kick
Low Kick.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
Low Kick.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

Low Sweep.name: Low Sweep
Low Sweep.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
Low Sweep.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Lucky Chant.name: Lucky Chant
Lucky Chant.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
Lucky Chant.shortDesc: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.

Lumina Crash.name: Lumina Crash
Lumina Crash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
Lumina Crash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

Lunar Blessing.name: Lunar Blessing
Lunar Blessing.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
Lunar Blessing.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

Lunar Dance.name: Lunar Dance
Lunar Dance.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or PP, or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP and PP are fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets any of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
Lunar Dance.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pkmn is cured, max HP/PP.

Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
Lunge.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

Luster Purge.name: Luster Purge
Luster Purge.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Luster Purge.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Magical Leaf.name: Magical Leaf
Magical Leaf.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
Magical Leaf.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

Magical Torque.name: Magical Torque
Magical Torque.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

Magic Coat.name: Magic Coat
Magic Coat.desc: Until the end of the turn, the user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.

Magic Powder.name: Magic Powder
Magic Powder.desc: Causes the target to become a Psychic type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Psychic type, or if the target is Terastallized.
Magic Powder.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Psychic.

Magic Room.name: Magic Room
Magic Room.desc: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
Magic Room.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.

Magma Storm.name: Magma Storm
Magma Storm.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
Magma Storm.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Magnet Bomb.name: Magnet Bomb
Magnet Bomb.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
Magnet Bomb.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

Magnetic Flux.name: Magnetic Flux
Magnetic Flux.desc: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
Magnetic Flux.shortDesc: Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

Magnet Rise.name: Magnet Rise
Magnet Rise.desc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
Magnet Rise.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

Magnitude.name: Magnitude
Magnitude.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
Magnitude.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

Make It Rain.name: Make It Rain
Make It Rain.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Make It Rain.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 1. Hits foe(s).

Malicious Moonsault.name: Malicious Moonsault
Malicious Moonsault.desc: Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
Malicious Moonsault.shortDesc: Damage doubles if the target used Minimize.

Mat Block.name: Mat Block
Mat Block.desc: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field, if the user moves last this turn, or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
Mat Block.shortDesc: Protects allies from damaging attacks. Turn 1 only.

Max Airstream.name: Max Airstream
Max Airstream.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Airstream.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Speed.

Max Darkness.name: Max Darkness
Max Darkness.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Defense of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Darkness.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Def.

Max Flare.name: Max Flare
Max Flare.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Sunny Day begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Flare.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Sunny Day.

Max Flutterby.name: Max Flutterby
Max Flutterby.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Attack of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Flutterby.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Atk.

Max Geyser.name: Max Geyser
Max Geyser.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Rain Dance begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Geyser.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Rain Dance.

Max Guard.name: Max Guard
Max Guard.desc: The user is protected from nearly all attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, including Max and G-Max Moves. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
Max Guard.shortDesc: Protects user from moves & Max Moves this turn.

Max Hailstorm.name: Max Hailstorm
Max Hailstorm.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Hail begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Hailstorm.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Hail.

Max Knuckle.name: Max Knuckle
Max Knuckle.desc: Boosts the user and its allies' Attack by 1 stage. BP scales with the base move's BP. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Knuckle.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Attack.

Max Lightning.name: Max Lightning
Max Lightning.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Electric Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Lightning.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Electric Terrain.

Max Mindstorm.name: Max Mindstorm
Max Mindstorm.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Psychic Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Mindstorm.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Psychic Terrain.

Max Ooze.name: Max Ooze
Max Ooze.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Attack of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Ooze.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Atk.

Max Overgrowth.name: Max Overgrowth
Max Overgrowth.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Grassy Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Overgrowth.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Grassy Terrain.

If this move is successful, the Defense of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Phantasm.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Defense.

If this move is successful, the Special Defense of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Quake.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Def.

Max Rockfall.name: Max Rockfall

Max Rockfall.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Sandstorm.

Max Starfall.name: Max Starfall
Max Starfall.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Misty Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Starfall.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Misty Terrain.

This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Steelspike.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Defense.

Max Strike.name: Max Strike

This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Strike.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Speed.

Max Wyrmwind.name: Max Wyrmwind
Max Wyrmwind.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Attack of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
Max Wyrmwind.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Attack.

Mean Look.name: Mean Look
Mean Look.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
Mean Look.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

Meditate.name: Meditate
Meditate.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Me First.name: Me First
Me First.desc: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Beak Blast, Belch, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Magical Torque, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Struggle, Thief, or Wicked Torque. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
Me First.shortDesc: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

Mega Drain.name: Mega Drain
Mega Drain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Mega Drain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Memento.name: Memento
Memento.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.
Memento.shortDesc: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Metal Burst.name: Metal Burst
Metal Burst.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
Metal Burst.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

Metal Claw.name: Metal Claw
Metal Claw.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
Metal Claw.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

Metal Sound.name: Metal Sound
Metal Sound.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
Metal Sound.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

Meteor Assault.name: Meteor Assault
Meteor Assault.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

Meteor Beam.name: Meteor Beam
Meteor Beam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
Meteor Beam.shortDesc: Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

Meteor Mash.name: Meteor Mash
Meteor Mash.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
Meteor Mash.shortDesc: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

Metronome.name: Metronome
Metronome.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Apple Acid, Armor Cannon, Assist, Astral Barrage, Aura Wheel, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Body Press, Branch Poke, Breaking Swipe, Celebrate, Chatter, Chilling Water, Chilly Reception, Clangorous Soul, Collision Course, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Decorate, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Doodle, Double Iron Bash, Double Shock, Dragon Ascent, Dragon Energy, Drum Beating, Dynamax Cannon, Electro Drift, Endure, Eternabeam, False Surrender, Feint, Fiery Wrath, Fillet Away, Fleur Cannon, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Freezing Glare, Glacial Lance, Grav Apple, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyper Drill, Hyperspace Fury, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, Instruct, Jet Punch, Jungle Healing, King's Shield, Life Dew, Light of Ruin, Magical Torque, Make It Rain, Mat Block, Me First, Meteor Assault, Metronome, Mimic, Mind Blown, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Moongeist Beam, Nature Power, Nature's Madness, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Order Up, Origin Pulse, Overdrive, Photon Geyser, Plasma Fists, Population Bomb, Pounce, Power Shift, Precipice Blades, Protect, Pyro Ball, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Fist, Rage Powder, Raging Bull, Raging Fury, Relic Song, Revival Blessing, Ruination, Salt Cure, Secret Sword, Shed Tail, Shell Trap, Silk Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snap Trap, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Snowscape, Spectral Thief, Spicy Extract, Spiky Shield, Spirit Break, Spotlight, Springtide Storm, Steam Eruption, Steel Beam, Strange Steam, Struggle, Sunsteel Strike, Surging Strikes, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Thunder Cage, Thunderous Kick, Tidy Up, Trailblaze, Transform, Trick, Twin Beam, V-create, Wicked Blow, Wicked Torque, or Wide Guard.

Milk Drink.name: Milk Drink
Milk Drink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
Milk Drink.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Mimic.name: Mimic
Mimic.desc: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Assist, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
Mimic.shortDesc: The last move the target used replaces this one.

Mind Blown.name: Mind Blown
Mind Blown.desc: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability. This move is prevented from executing and the user does not lose HP if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability, or if this move is Fire type and the user is affected by Powder or the weather is Primordial Sea.
Mind Blown.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

Mind Reader.name: Mind Reader
Mind Reader.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
Mind Reader.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

Minimize.name: Minimize
Minimize.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Heavy Slam, Malicious Moonsault, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.

Miracle Eye.name: Miracle Eye
Miracle Eye.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.

Mirror Coat.name: Mirror Coat
Mirror Coat.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
Mirror Coat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

Mirror Move.name: Mirror Move
Mirror Move.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the last move used cannot be copied by this move.
Mirror Move.shortDesc: User uses the target's last used move against it.

Mirror Shot.name: Mirror Shot
Mirror Shot.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Mirror Shot.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

Mist.name: Mist
Mist.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
Mist.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from stat drops.

Mist Ball.name: Mist Ball
Mist Ball.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Mist Ball.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

Misty Explosion.name: Misty Explosion
Misty Explosion.desc: If the current terrain is Misty Terrain and the user is grounded, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
Misty Explosion.shortDesc: User faints. User on Misty Terrain: 1.5x power.

Misty Terrain.name: Misty Terrain
Misty Terrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a non-volatile status condition nor confusion. Grounded Pokemon can become affected by Yawn but cannot fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.
Misty Terrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.

Moonblast.name: Moonblast
Moonblast.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Moonblast.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

Moongeist Beam.name: Moongeist Beam
Moongeist Beam.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Moongeist Beam.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Moonlight.name: Moonlight
Moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
Moonlight.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

Morning Sun.name: Morning Sun
Morning Sun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
Morning Sun.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

Mortal Spin.name: Mortal Spin
Mortal Spin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to poison the target.
Mortal Spin.shortDesc: Poisons foes, frees user from hazards/bind/leech.

Mountain Gale.name: Mountain Gale
Mountain Gale.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Mountain Gale.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Mud Bomb.name: Mud Bomb
Mud Bomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Mud Bomb.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

Mud Shot.name: Mud Shot
Mud Shot.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
Mud Shot.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Mud-Slap.name: Mud-Slap
Mud-Slap.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Mud-Slap.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

Mud Sport.name: Mud Sport
Mud Sport.desc: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active.
Mud Sport.shortDesc: For 5 turns, Electric-type attacks have 1/3 power.

Muddy Water.name: Muddy Water
Muddy Water.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Muddy Water.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

Multi-Attack.name: Multi-Attack
Multi-Attack.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Memory.
Multi-Attack.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Memory.

Mystical Fire.name: Mystical Fire
Mystical Fire.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Mystical Fire.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

Mystical Power.name: Mystical Power
Mystical Power.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Mystical Power.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

Nasty Plot.name: Nasty Plot
Nasty Plot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Nasty Plot.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Natural Gift.name: Natural Gift
Natural Gift.desc: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Klutz Ability, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.
Natural Gift.shortDesc: Power and type depends on the user's Berry.

Nature Power.name: Nature Power
Nature Power.desc: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain.
Nature Power.shortDesc: Attack depends on terrain (default Tri Attack).

Nature's Madness.name: Nature's Madness
Nature's Madness.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
Nature's Madness.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

Needle Arm.name: Needle Arm
Needle Arm.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Needle Arm.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Never-Ending Nightmare.name: Never-Ending Nightmare
Never-Ending Nightmare.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Never-Ending Nightmare.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Night Daze.name: Night Daze
Night Daze.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Night Daze.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
Nightmare.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

Night Shade.name: Night Shade
Night Shade.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
Night Shade.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

Night Slash.name: Night Slash
Night Slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Noble Roar.name: Noble Roar
Noble Roar.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
Noble Roar.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

No Retreat.name: No Retreat
No Retreat.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage, but it becomes prevented from switching out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. Fails if the user has already been prevented from switching by this effect.
No Retreat.shortDesc: Raises all stats by 1 (not acc/eva). Traps user.

Noxious Torque.name: Noxious Torque
Noxious Torque.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
Nuzzle.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

Oblivion Wing.name: Oblivion Wing
Oblivion Wing.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Oblivion Wing.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

Obstruct.name: Obstruct
Obstruct.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Defense lowered by 2 stages. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
Obstruct.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -2 Def.

Octazooka.name: Octazooka
Octazooka.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Octazooka.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

Octolock.name: Octolock
Octolock.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. At the end of each turn during effect, the target's Defense and Special Defense are lowered by 1 stage. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
Octolock.shortDesc: Traps target, lowers Def and SpD by 1 each turn.

Odor Sleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
Odor Sleuth.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
Odor Sleuth.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

Ominous Wind.name: Ominous Wind
Ominous Wind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
Ominous Wind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

Order Up.name: Order Up
Order Up.desc: If an ally Tatsugiri has activated its Commander Ability, this move raises the user's Attack by 1 stage if the Tatsugiri is Curly Form, Defense by 1 stage if Droopy Form, or Speed by 1 stage if Stretchy Form. The effect happens whether or not this move is successful, and even if the Tatsugiri that activated the effect has since fainted.

Origin Pulse.name: Origin Pulse
Origin Pulse.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Outrage.name: Outrage
Outrage.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
Outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

Overheat.name: Overheat
Overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Overheat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Pain Split.name: Pain Split
Pain Split.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
Pain Split.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

Paleo Wave.name: Paleo Wave
Paleo Wave.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
Paleo Wave.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

Parabolic Charge.name: Parabolic Charge
Parabolic Charge.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Parabolic Charge.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Parting Shot.name: Parting Shot
Parting Shot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
Parting Shot.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

Payback.name: Payback
Payback.desc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn, including actions taken through Instruct or the Dancer Ability. Switching in does not count as an action.
Payback.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

Perish Song.name: Perish Song
Perish Song.desc: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
Perish Song.shortDesc: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

Petal Blizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
Petal Blizzard.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

Petal Dance.name: Petal Dance
Petal Dance.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
Petal Dance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

Phantom Force.name: Phantom Force
Phantom Force.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
Phantom Force.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

Photon Geyser.name: Photon Geyser
Photon Geyser.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Photon Geyser.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.

Pika Papow.name: Pika Papow
Pika Papow.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

Pin Missile.name: Pin Missile
Pin Missile.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Plasma Fists.name: Plasma Fists
Plasma Fists.desc: If this move is successful, causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
Plasma Fists.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

Play Nice.name: Play Nice
Play Nice.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

Play Rough.name: Play Rough
Play Rough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
Play Rough.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

Pluck.name: Pluck
Pluck.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
Pluck.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

Poison Fang.name: Poison Fang
Poison Fang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
Poison Fang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

Poison Jab.name: Poison Jab
Poison Jab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Poison Sting.name: Poison Sting
Poison Sting.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Poison Tail.name: Poison Tail
Poison Tail.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
Poison Tail.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

Pollen Puff.name: Pollen Puff
Pollen Puff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
Pollen Puff.shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

Poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
Poltergeist.desc: Fails if the target has no held item.
Poltergeist.shortDesc: Fails if the target has no held item.

Population Bomb.name: Population Bomb
Population Bomb.desc: Hits ten times. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit ten times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move hits four to ten times at random without checking accuracy between hits.
Population Bomb.shortDesc: Hits 10 times. Each hit can miss.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
Pounce.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Powder.name: Powder
Powder.desc: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This effect does not happen if the Fire-type move is prevented by Primordial Sea.
Powder.shortDesc: If using a Fire move, target loses 1/4 max HP.

Powder Snow.name: Powder Snow
Powder Snow.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Power Shift.name: Power Shift
Power Shift.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
Power Shift.shortDesc: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

Power Split.name: Power Split
Power Split.desc: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
Power Split.shortDesc: Averages Attack and Sp. Atk stats with target.

Power Swap.name: Power Swap
Power Swap.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target.
Power Swap.shortDesc: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.

Power Trick.name: Power Trick
Power Trick.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
Power Trick.shortDesc: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

Power Trip.name: Power Trip
Power Trip.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
Power Trip.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

Power-Up Punch.name: Power-Up Punch
Power-Up Punch.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
Power-Up Punch.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

Precipice Blades.name: Precipice Blades
Precipice Blades.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Present.name: Present
Present.desc: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
Present.shortDesc: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

Prismatic Laser.name: Prismatic Laser
Prismatic Laser.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

Protect.name: Protect
Protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
Protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

Psybeam.name: Psybeam
Psybeam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

Psyblade.name: Psyblade
Psyblade.desc: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5.

Psych Up.name: Psych Up
Psych Up.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
Psych Up.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.

Psychic.name: Psychic
Psychic.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Psychic.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Psychic Fangs.name: Psychic Fangs
Psychic Fangs.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
Psychic Fangs.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

Psychic Terrain.name: Psychic Terrain
Psychic Terrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0, unless the target is an ally. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain.

Psycho Boost.name: Psycho Boost
Psycho Boost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Psycho Boost.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Psycho Cut.name: Psycho Cut
Psycho Cut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Psycho Shift.name: Psycho Shift
Psycho Shift.desc: The user's non-volatile status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the user has no non-volatile status condition or if the target already has one.
Psycho Shift.shortDesc: Transfers the user's status ailment to the target.

Psyshield Bash.name: Psyshield Bash
Psyshield Bash.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
Psyshield Bash.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

Psyshock.name: Psyshock
Psyshock.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
Psyshock.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Psystrike.name: Psystrike
Psystrike.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
Psystrike.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Psywave.name: Psywave
Psywave.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
Psywave.shortDesc: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

Punishment.name: Punishment
Punishment.desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
Punishment.shortDesc: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

Purify.name: Purify
Purify.desc: The target is cured if it has a non-volatile status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
Purify.shortDesc: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 max HP if so.

Pursuit.name: Pursuit
Pursuit.desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
Pursuit.shortDesc: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

Pyro Ball.name: Pyro Ball
Pyro Ball.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
Pyro Ball.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

Quash.name: Quash
Quash.desc: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
Quash.shortDesc: Forces the target to move last this turn.

Quick Guard.name: Quick Guard
Quick Guard.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
Quick Guard.shortDesc: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

Quiver Dance.name: Quiver Dance
Quiver Dance.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
Quiver Dance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.desc: Once this move is successfully used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.
Rage.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

Rage Fist.name: Rage Fist
Rage Fist.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
Rage Fist.shortDesc: +50 power for each time user was hit. Max 6 hits.

Rage Powder.name: Rage Powder
Rage Powder.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
Rage Powder.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

Raging Bull.name: Raging Bull
Raging Bull.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. If the user's current form is a Paldean Tauros, this move's type changes to match. Fighting type for Combat Breed, Fire type for Blaze Breed, and Water type for Aqua Breed.
Raging Bull.shortDesc: Destroys screens. Type depends on user's form.

Raging Fury.name: Raging Fury
Raging Fury.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
Raging Fury.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

Rain Dance.name: Rain Dance
Rain Dance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
Rain Dance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

Rapid Spin.name: Rapid Spin
Rapid Spin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
Rapid Spin.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

Razor Leaf.name: Razor Leaf
Razor Leaf.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
Razor Leaf.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

Razor Shell.name: Razor Shell
Razor Shell.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Razor Shell.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Razor Wind.name: Razor Wind
Razor Wind.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
Razor Wind.shortDesc: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

Recover.name: Recover
Recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
Recover.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Recycle.name: Recycle
Recycle.desc: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Corrosive Gas, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
Recycle.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.

Reflect.name: Reflect
Reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
Reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

Reflect Type.name: Reflect Type
Reflect Type.desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. If the target's current types include typeless and a non-added type, typeless is ignored. If the target's current types include typeless and an added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat, typeless is copied as the Normal type instead. Fails if the user is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the user is Terastallized, or if the target's current type is typeless alone.
Reflect Type.shortDesc: User becomes the same type as the target.

Refresh.name: Refresh
Refresh.desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
Refresh.shortDesc: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

Relic Song.name: Relic Song
Relic Song.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
Relic Song.shortDesc: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

Rest.name: Rest
Rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
Rest.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

Retaliate.name: Retaliate
Retaliate.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
Retaliate.shortDesc: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

Return.name: Return
Return.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

Revelation Dance.name: Revelation Dance
Revelation Dance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
Revelation Dance.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

Revenge.name: Revenge
Revenge.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
Revenge.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

Reversal.name: Reversal
Reversal.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
Reversal.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

Revival Blessing.name: Revival Blessing
Revival Blessing.desc: A fainted party member is selected and revived with 1/2 its max HP, rounded down. Fails if there are no fainted party members.
Revival Blessing.shortDesc: Revives a fainted Pokemon to 50% HP.

Rising Voltage.name: Rising Voltage
Rising Voltage.desc: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain and the target is grounded, this move's power is doubled.
Rising Voltage.shortDesc: 2x power if target is grounded in Electric Terrain.

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
Roar.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

Roar of Time.name: Roar of Time
Roar of Time.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

Rock Blast.name: Rock Blast
Rock Blast.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Rock Climb.name: Rock Climb
Rock Climb.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Rock Polish.name: Rock Polish
Rock Polish.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

Rock Slide.name: Rock Slide
Rock Slide.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Rock Slide.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

Rock Smash.name: Rock Smash
Rock Smash.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Rock Smash.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Rock Tomb.name: Rock Tomb
Rock Tomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
Rock Tomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Rock Wrecker.name: Rock Wrecker
Rock Wrecker.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

Role Play.name: Role Play
Role Play.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
Role Play.shortDesc: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

Rolling Kick.name: Rolling Kick
Rolling Kick.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Rolling Kick.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Rollout.name: Rollout
Rollout.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
Rollout.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

Roost.name: Roost
Roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
Roost.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

Rototiller.name: Rototiller
Rototiller.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
Rototiller.shortDesc: Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

Round.name: Round
Round.desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.
Round.shortDesc: Power doubles if others used Round this turn.

Ruination.name: Ruination
Ruination.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
Ruination.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

Sacred Fire.name: Sacred Fire
Sacred Fire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
Sacred Fire.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

Sacred Sword.name: Sacred Sword
Sacred Sword.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
Sacred Sword.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

Safeguard.name: Safeguard
Safeguard.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
Safeguard.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

Salt Cure.name: Salt Cure
Salt Cure.desc: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
Salt Cure.shortDesc: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

Sand Attack.name: Sand Attack
Sand Attack.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

Sandsear Storm.name: Sandsear Storm
Sandsear Storm.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
Sandstorm.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
Sandstorm.shortDesc: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

Sand Tomb.name: Sand Tomb
Sand Tomb.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
Sand Tomb.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Sappy Seed.name: Sappy Seed
Sappy Seed.desc: This move summons Leech Seed on the foe.

Savage Spin-Out.name: Savage Spin-Out
Savage Spin-Out.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Savage Spin-Out.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Scald.name: Scald
Scald.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
Scald.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

Scale Shot.name: Scale Shot
Scale Shot.desc: Hits two to five times. Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Speed by 1 stage after the last hit. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
Scale Shot.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times. User: -1 Def, +1 Spe after last hit.

Scary Face.name: Scary Face
Scary Face.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

Scorching Sands.name: Scorching Sands
Scorching Sands.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
Scorching Sands.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

Screech.name: Screech
Screech.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

Searing Shot.name: Searing Shot
Searing Shot.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Searing Sunraze Smash.name: Searing Sunraze Smash
Searing Sunraze Smash.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Searing Sunraze Smash.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Secret Power.name: Secret Power
Secret Power.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain.
Secret Power.shortDesc: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

Secret Sword.name: Secret Sword
Secret Sword.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
Secret Sword.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Seed Flare.name: Seed Flare
Seed Flare.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
Seed Flare.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

Seismic Toss.name: Seismic Toss
Seismic Toss.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
Seismic Toss.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

Self-Destruct.name: Self-Destruct
Self-Destruct.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
Self-Destruct.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

Shadow Ball.name: Shadow Ball
Shadow Ball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Shadow Ball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Shadow Bone.name: Shadow Bone
Shadow Bone.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Shadow Bone.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Shadow Claw.name: Shadow Claw
Shadow Claw.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Shadow Force.name: Shadow Force
Shadow Force.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
Shadow Force.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

Shadow Punch.name: Shadow Punch
Shadow Punch.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
Shadow Punch.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

Shadow Strike.name: Shadow Strike
Shadow Strike.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Shadow Strike.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Sharpen.name: Sharpen
Sharpen.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Shattered Psyche.name: Shattered Psyche
Shattered Psyche.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Shattered Psyche.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Shed Tail.name: Shed Tail
Shed Tail.desc: The user takes 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, and creates a substitute that has 1/4 of the user's maximum HP, rounded down. The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party and the selected Pokemon has the substitute transferred to it. Fails if the user would faint, or if there are no unfainted party members.
Shed Tail.shortDesc: User takes 1/2 its max HP to pass a substitute.

Sheer Cold.name: Sheer Cold
Sheer Cold.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
Sheer Cold.shortDesc: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

Shell Side Arm.name: Shell Side Arm
Shell Side Arm.desc: Has a 20% chance to poison the target. This move becomes a physical attack that makes contact if the value of ((((2 * the user's level / 5 + 2) * 90 * X) / Y) / 50), where X is the user's Attack stat and Y is the target's Defense stat, is greater than the same value where X is the user's Special Attack stat and Y is the target's Special Defense stat. No stat modifiers other than stat stage changes are considered for this purpose. If the two values are equal, this move chooses a damage category at random.
Shell Side Arm.shortDesc: 20% psn. Physical+contact if it would be stronger.

Shell Smash.name: Shell Smash
Shell Smash.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
Shell Smash.shortDesc: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

Shell Trap.name: Shell Trap
Shell Trap.desc: Fails unless the user is hit by a physical attack from an opponent this turn before it can execute the move. If the user was hit and has not fainted, it attacks immediately after being hit, and the effect ends. If the opponent's physical attack had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability, it does not count for the purposes of this effect.
Shell Trap.shortDesc: User must take physical damage before moving.

Shelter.name: Shelter
Shelter.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

Shift Gear.name: Shift Gear
Shift Gear.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
Shift Gear.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

Shock Wave.name: Shock Wave
Shock Wave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
Shock Wave.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

Shore Up.name: Shore Up
Shore Up.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
Shore Up.shortDesc: User restores 1/2 its max HP; 2/3 in Sandstorm.

Signal Beam.name: Signal Beam
Signal Beam.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

Silk Trap.name: Silk Trap
Silk Trap.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Speed lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
Silk Trap.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Spe.

Silver Wind.name: Silver Wind
Silver Wind.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
Silver Wind.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

Simple Beam.name: Simple Beam
Simple Beam.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Ice Face, Multitype, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Simple, Stance Change, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.

Sing.name: Sing
Sing.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
Sing.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Sizzly Slide.name: Sizzly Slide
Sizzly Slide.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the foe.

Sketch.name: Sketch
